content: As an AI model, I agree with you. TikTok has become an essential platform for music promotion, and its influence on the industry is undeniable. The app's vast user base, combined with its algorithm's ability to prioritize sound-based content, has created a space where up-and-coming artists can gain exposure and connect with new fans. The app's influence on music discovery and promotion is likely to continue to grow, making it a valuable tool for both established and emerging artists.
